meanings.definition: A very large corporation consisting of a number of smaller companies.
meanings.sent1: The superconglomerate controlled various businesses in the city.
meanings.sent2: The superconglomerate acquired a new company last month.
meanings.sent3: The superconglomerate's CEO had to juggle many responsibilities.
meanings.sent4: The superconglomerate was a giant puzzle of interconnected companies.
meanings.sent5: The superconglomerate's influence spread far and wide.

meanings.definition: To combine or merge into a superconglomerate.
meanings.sent1: They decided to superconglomerate their businesses for better efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The two companies superconglomerated to form a stronger entity.
meanings.sent3: The idea to superconglomerate the projects seemed daunting at first.
meanings.sent4: Their collaboration superconglomerated into a successful venture.
meanings.sent5: The decision to superconglomerate paid off in the long run.
